sentence.Network_en: The relationship between share repurchase and EPS was analysed.
sentence.Network_cn: 分析了股份回购同每股收益和每股净资产之间的关系.

sentence.Network_en: Giants plan to use working capital financing to complete the repurchase program.
sentence.Network_cn: 巨人计划以可用运营资金融资来完成回购计划.

sentence.Network_en: A corporation's repurchase of stock or bonds it has issued.
sentence.Network_cn: 公司将自己发行的股票或债券购回.

1. buy what had previously been sold, lost, or given away;
